name: Sean HANNON, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Hannon v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Sean HANNON, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of April, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed. The Application for the Appointment of Counsel is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
825 A.2d 617
Sean HANNON, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 29, 2003.
